Sentencas: A new vapor deposition process, polarized electrochemical vapor deposition (PEVD), has been developed recently.
Titulo: Applying polarized electrochemical vapor deposition (PEVD) to solid state ionic devices

Sentencas: The significance of PEVD is that it applies solid state ionic techniques to modify the widely accepted CVD technique under well-controlled conditions in a solid electrochemical cell.
Titulo: Applying polarized electrochemical vapor deposition (PEVD) to solid state ionic devices

Sentencas: This provides PEVD with easy process control and unique electrocrystallization behavior.
Titulo: Applying polarized electrochemical vapor deposition (PEVD) to solid state ionic devices

Sentencas: Consequently, it holds promise for a wide range of potential applications for solid stare ionic devices.
Titulo: Applying polarized electrochemical vapor deposition (PEVD) to solid state ionic devices

Sentencas: Investigations show that PEVD is the most suitable technique to improve solid electrolyte/electrode contact and, subsequently, the performance of solid state ionic devices.
Titulo: Applying polarized electrochemical vapor deposition (PEVD) to solid state ionic devices

Sentencas: In this paper, current applications of PEVD for potentiometric gaseous oxide sensors and solid oxide fuel cells is discussed.
Titulo: Applying polarized electrochemical vapor deposition (PEVD) to solid state ionic devices
